# Roadmap {#roadmap}

The initial __tercen.com__ was launched in the year 2020.

The following improvements are planned during year 2020.

* Better documentation, guides and videos (2020)
* Adding more operators (2020)
* improvements in the importation of data (2020)
* improvements in the __apps__ support (2020)
* Performance improvements (2020)
* Python support (2021)
